metrics-plugin.description: Cassandra database backed metrics server plugin
metrics-plugin.name: metrics-cassandra

serverplugin:control.name: createLocalCluster
serverplugin:control.description: This operation installs, configures, and starts Cassandra nodes on a single machine. Additionally, the RHQ schema is installed on the cluster. The first node is assigned the localhost address 127.0.0.1. Additional nodes are assigned aliases for localhost, e.g., 127.0.0.2, 127.0.0.3, etc. The operation assumes that the necessary aliases already exist.

c:simple-property.name: host
c:simple-property.description: The host name or IP address to provision with Cassandra nodes. All nodes are installed on this machine. The first node will be assigned to 127.0.0.1 and subsequent nodes will be assigned to localhost aliases of the form 127.0.0.2, 127.0.0.3, etc. Note that the operation assumes that all necessary aliases already exist.

c:simple-property.name: clusterDirectory
c:simple-property.description: The directory in which Cassandra nodes will be installed.

c:simple-property.name: numberOfNodes
c:simple-property.description: The number of Cassandra nodes to install. Note that a localhost alias needs to be configured for each node beyond the first one.
